page.title: 17Schools contd
page.content: name suggests it has children from the age of 5 right through to the age of 12. Similarly Lickey First and Middle School, which also sends pupils to Waseley High School, has pupils from 5 to 12. This School serves the village of Lickey, some three miles from the High School. Frankley estate has a new purpose built High School and Community College. This also incorporates the Community Library and other facilities. This is fed by two Middle Schools, Frogmill Middle and Reaside Middle. These both have children form the age of 8 to 12. Both schools are in turn fed from the Beeches First School.
